Name: Disrupting Lazor
Overcharge: Spend 1:energy:. Target must return their Bingo chip and draw again

Name: Disabling Lazor
Overcharge: Spend 1:energy:. Target's activated item is disabled for next round

Name: Focused Lazor
Overcharge: Spend 1:energy:. Deal an extra 1:damage: to target

Name: Vampiric Lazor
Overcharge: Spend 2:energy:. Regain full health if your attack kills target

Name: Prismatic Lazor
Overcharge: Spend 2:energy:. Deal 1:damage: to up to 3 opponents sharing your letter or number
